about_the_game:
Explore the unknown, challenge the limits of your heartbeat! Do the horror games on the market make you feel too hardcore and unbearable? Come on, let's lead you into an unprecedented and thrilling new world - 《Ship Of Mist》!

《Ship Of Mist》 - This is not just a game, it is a perfect encounter of fantasy thriller and humorous elements! Here, the humorous dialogue system makes you burst out laughing, and the dynamic music melody makes every pore tremble with it. We break tradition and add a bright color to horror with music, creating a unique new trend of horror games!

The story is set in a distant future, an era where technology and artificial intelligence are intertwined. When human dreams and self-awareness are replaced by AI, the world becomes dull and uninteresting. And our protagonist,Ruoshui, a clever and brave girl, embarked on an adventure to steal the Dream Jar in order to awaken the souls of a few people and for the generous reward.

But this road is not so smooth~Scary events are coming one after another, are you ready?

The game features a variety of highlights:

【Scenario dialogue, personality fully displayed】——In depth dialogue, revealing the inner world of the Ruoshui. Her wit, bravery, and even a slight confusion will make you unable to put it down and laugh with her in horror!

【Dynamic music, horror becomes fun】——Each background music is carefully selected, not only to create an atmosphere, but also to make horror full of wit and humor. Follow the rhythm and sway together in the thrilling wave!

【Immersive, blending technology with classicism】——uniquely designed scenes make you feel as if you have traveled through time and space. The perfect fusion of technology and classics, every detail is waiting for you to explore, taking you to experience an unprecedented visual feast!

【Surprises in the game】——There are many unexpected surprises waiting for you to discover in 《Ship Of Mist》. Every trigger is a surprise, making your adventure more colorful!

Come and join 《Ship Of Mist》, become the traveler who travels through time and space, and embark on thrilling and fun adventures in a fantasy world! You are the next hero to change the world!
